text: Congratulations might be in order for Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth, according to new reports. Insiders told Life & Style magazine the pair secretly web in a ‘ hippie - style ’ ceremony at their Malibu, California mansion. ‘ They ’ ve actually done the deed for real this time!
